channel.title: software engineer on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in software engineer on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Happy 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: As we enter a new year, I want to reflect on the role that software has played in my life. From the early days of my career to now, software has been a constant presence and something that I have dedicated countless hours to as both an engineer and project manager.

item.title: Dwarves Radar Program
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Dwarves Radar Program The Dwarves have a spinning radar. This radar is how we assess and adopt new technology. Throughout the years, we observe the tech industry and pick out the most promising tech to put into the radar to begin the assessment process.

item.title: Showcase
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Showcase Every Friday afternoon, everyone in the company is invited to gather on Discord for internal demos of projects teams have been working on.
